articles.description: Estimates from King's College show that coronavirus cases in northern England could be as many as 4,500 per day amid lockdown easing fears
articles.content:
Coronavirus infection rates in England's northern regions are now nearly double that in London, according to a new estimate.
The figures, from King's College London, suggest the daily rate of infect… [+1470 chars]
